blog.name: aiklahori
blog.title: A Lahori's Tumblings
blog.description:
For the brave souls who got this far: You are the chosen ones, the valiant knights who toil away, without rest.
To you, true wanderers, saviors, kings of men (or queens of women :) ) I say this: never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down, never gonna run around and desert you. Never gonna make you cry, never gonna say goodbye. Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you.

summary: Hi! First of all thank you to all the people that follow me and that enjoy with my post, I love all of you, but this write it’s...
body:
@idunn.artist

Hi! First of all thank you to all the people that follow me and that enjoy with my post, I love all of you, but this write it’s about a pic that I reblogged about Teddy Lupin, that pic it’s from a illustrator (@idunn.artist) that it’s begging and that I follow in Instagram, she has just to remove her account here in tumblr but, please if you are interesting or at least a little bit curious, follow her there in instagram.

Thank you guys and once more really I love that you enjoy with my post :)

(I asked her for permission and here you have Teddy’s post)

summary: The Chaser and the Keeper
title: The Chaser and the Keeper
body:
-A Harry Potter Next Generation Story- (James II/OC)

► More than Friends

***Jessica quickly dashed out of the common room, desperate to escape the glares of the people in her house. Everyone was so angry at her. She knew she screwed up. James had yelled at her loud enough…

Read more…

Oh hey another Weasley. I made friends with 2 of the coolest Weasley’s in Hogwarts I’m sure he’s very—
ANNNNND I already don’t...
body:
Oh hey another Weasley. I made friends with 2 of the coolest Weasley’s in Hogwarts I’m sure he’s very—

ANNNNND I already don’t like him. Never thought it would be possible to NOT like a Weasley.

blog.name: sweetlialia
blog.title: Lia
blog.description: Mostly HP but non exclusively // Huffelpuff and proud // sometimes I write but I mostly reblog

summary: To rise and fall
title: To rise and fall
body:
TW : this all stuff could be triggering on too many level

Harry couldn’t take his eyes off the blond git dancing a few feet away from him. Weeks had passed before he understood he couldn’t just show up every weekend, hoping to see him as he seemed to follow his own unpredictable schedule so he decided to come whenever he wanted, a burning fire devouring his guts as he scanned the crowd, as tonight. Tonight was a lucky night; Malfoy was there, his pale skin glittering in the neon lights, wordlessly begging to be consumed. Harry couldn’t help it, seeing him in that state of mind always made his heart blow.

Here in this soundless muggle nightclub, Draco wasn’t the same anymore. His own headphones on, he let himself be, shamelessly. The music louder than his thoughts, he would dance until dawn, exhausting his body, ripping the voices out of his brain. Then, when the club will close, he will find his way toward the exit, meeting his lover there and heading to a bed, waiting for them. He would feel better for a day or two and Harry would lie beside him when nightmares would crawl back again.

It was hard, dating Malfoy. He hadn’t learn to wear a mask, he had learn to become it and months of trying to destroy it had left scars. He didn’t knew how to act without his pureblood etiquette and he had had to learn how to live for the sole purpose of living. Being the unique Malfoy heir was all he had been raised to be: don’t stain your family name, marry a pureblood, have a male heir. But he had grown knowing that it wasn’t right, that he wouldn’t follow that path. So he did what was right: he lied to save a scared-head boy, threw him a wand, testified against family members during trials. And at night he would hear their voices in his head, he would feel the ache of too many crucio, the bites of an hippogriff or the strong jaws of a werewolf, the sharp pain of blades and he would wake up screaming. He would then endure the day trying to be himself when he was only wearing another mask that didn’t fit as well. Only when he started dating the Saviour did he let himself crumble to pieces. Harry would sing him to sleep, hug him so tight he would finally feel safe and warm. Holding him so tight he knew he would never let go. Offering him a home and not a bed, a place that will be a safe hearth, somewhere to rise and somewhere to fall.

Now in the muggle club, he had another place to be. He would show up there, always unplanned, and live. Sometimes he would smile and Harry’s heart would miss a beat at how pure that smile could still be. Sometimes he would leave his hoodie in a stool and live without fearing the gaze on his Mark, on his scared limbs. And sometimes, as tonight, he would dance with his eyes opened, locked in his lover’s one and wordlessly agreeing that he was alive, and that Harry’d been right, it didn’t always sucked.

“Do you know what I was thinking about tonight?” did he asked as Harry held the door of his flat open.

“Tell me.

-I was thinking about you.

-Pleasant thoughts I hope.

-I was thinking about how much I love you.

-I love you too.” He smiled against Draco’s lips.

“I’m ready, now.” He whispered later, Harry curled around him in the morning light. “Would you take me there?

-I will.

-Will you be there when I get out?

-I will.

-Thank you Harry. Thank you for everything. Thank you for saving me. I don’t know if I’d still be alive without you.

-Draco…

-No it’s okay. I’m okay. It’s just, you know. I used to hate you, for fucking everything up and making me want to stay. But now I’m happy you did. And I’m going to prove it and make up for it. I’m going to get my brain fucked up and fixed again, and when I’ll be back, I’ll make sure you’ll feel like the happiest man alive.

summary: Dramione
body:
Dramione

Hermione: *glances at Draco* yes professor you called us in?

McGonagall: Yes, Ms. Granger, Mr. Malfoy. As head boy and girl, we have decided that we would like you two to date a-

Draco: uh, excuse me what?!

McGonagall: it’s just to show house unity and and to get rid of the separation

Hermione: Professor! This is ridiculous

McGonagall: it will earn you extra credit

Hermione: oh

Draco: oh

McGonagall: well then! That is all! Have fun you two

*later on in the evening*

Slughorn: well what happened Minerva??

McGonagall: *clapping hands and squealing* IT WAS SOOO EASY!! THEY FELL FOR THE TRAP. THE DRAMIONE SHIP IS SET TO SAIL!

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: crimsonrevolt-promo
blog.title: crimson revolt promo
blog.description: Crimson Revolt is a multi-para, literate roleplay group that takes place during the First Wizarding War. The group focuses on character and plot development through the themes of war and death. All edits posted here were created by the admins and members of Crimson Revolt and were posted with permission. For more information, please visit the main @crimsonrevolt.

summary: CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES   “How dreadful…     to be caught in a  G A M E         and have no idea...
caption:
CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES

“How dreadful…

to be caught in a G A M E

and have no idea of the rules.”

A FIRST WIZARDING WAR ROLEPLAY.

After a year of Death Eater captivity, the return of AMELIA BONES has shaken up the Wizarding World of England. As the Death Eaters try desperately to quiet Amelia and those who attempt to speak her truth, the rebel group Aversio rushes in to capitalize on her thirst for violence and quest for revenge, leaving the Order of Phoenix to wonder if their attempts at peace are as futile as they seem. Just as things seem bleak, the Daily Prophet headquarters burns high on one August night, lighting a path of opportunity for the Aversio propaganda THE QUIBBLER to make its way through the community as the public scrambles for information. With Death Eaters controlling the Ministry and Aversio terrorizing the streets, this small spark of rebellion has turned into a fire that threatens to D E S T R O Y everything in its path.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

We are a group of writers dedicated to plot and character development. As an 18+ group, we’re looking for mature, dedicated, and passionate people seeking a long term roleplay that will focus on themes such as war and death. Most threads on the dash are full of substance, which means most are paragraphs or longer gif chats! The Admin Team posts prompts, plot drops, and events as needed, averaging 1-2 major plot drops per month with smaller challenges and events in between. If you’re looking for a plot heavy group with surprises and twists, come apply today!

tags: okay he did a few good things
but that doesn't automatically make him a good person
summary:
"Snape was a bad person and we ought to stop glorifying him," I say into the mic.
The crowd boos. I begin to walk off in shame,...
body:
“Snape was a bad person and we ought to stop glorifying him,” I say into the mic.

The crowd boos. I begin to walk off in shame, when a voice speaks and commands silence from the room.

“She’s right,” they say. I look for the owner of the voice. There, in the fifth row stands: Lily Evans herself.

summary: Shattered windows
title: Shattered windows
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2DijTiF

by Stars_dreaming

In this alternative universe, Donna-Eve Carter owns one of the most famous companies in the world - Aedas. With her mother being a professional athlete and her father an actor and a model, Donna-Eve has always had people to look up to. Her whole life she’s tried to make sure she’s the best daughter, who can achieve things normal people can’t.
When she bumps into a handsome stranger on the street and he spills his coffee over her blouse, he offers her his hoodie. Begrudgingly, she takes it and she makes her way to work.
Is this the start of something beautiful?

blog.name: aiklahori
blog.title: A Lahori's Tumblings
blog.description:
For the brave souls who got this far: You are the chosen ones, the valiant knights who toil away, without rest.
To you, true wanderers, saviors, kings of men (or queens of women :) ) I say this: never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down, never gonna run around and desert you. Never gonna make you cry, never gonna say goodbye. Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you.

[Sirius is in McGonagall’s office after being caught doing something stupid]

Sirius: No, I think Jenga is a game.

McGonagall: Do you think this is a game?

Sirius: No, I think Jenga is a game.
